form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Affidavit for Persons 14 Years of Age and Older

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/27/2023 10. I am, or have been within the past 5 years, or intend to be engaged in the following activities: OFFICE In addition to other information, list memberships or activities in clubs, organizations, or societies USE A.C.J.M. AFFIDAVIT FOR PERSONS 14 YEARS OF AGE AND OLDER Subscribed and sworn to (or I have read or have had read to me the above statements, and affirmed) before me at the place and do hereby swear (or affirm) that these statements are true and on the date here designated by the complete to the best of my knowledge and belief. official post-office stamp below.
